Frequency once per 10 minutes

Trigger Another creature attempts a check to investigate a lead you're pursuing

You share information with the triggering creature.

They gain a circumstance bonus to their check equal to your circumstance bonus to checks investigating your subject from @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Pursue a Lead]{Pursue a Lead}. The GM can add any relevant traits to this reaction depending on the situation, such as auditory and linguistic if you're conveying information verbally.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.Effect: Clue In]{Effect: Clue In}
